1-Wire technology allows for remote sensing and control on a hobbyist's budget. It uses the Dallas/Maxim set of controllers to read humidity, temperature, light, presence-of-water, switch closures, etc.

This is my guide to the technology as it relates to Ubuntu Linux. Feel free to join in!
